about_the_game:
Introducing Ball Pain: A Bouncing Adventure Unlike Any Other!

Embark on an exhilarating journey where your skill and a dash of luck will propel you to the pinnacle of each tricky environment. Prepare to conquer obstacles, avoid disasters, and unravel the mystery that lies at the top. Are you ready for the challenge?

. Bounce your way to new heights: Engage in a thrilling adventure as you navigate through uniquely designed environments, each teeming with dangers and challenges. From precarious platforms to treacherous traps, the path to victory won't be easy, but the reward will be worth it.

. Forge your own path: Embrace the freedom to choose your route to success. Will you take the obvious path, or will you forge your own way through hidden shortcuts and secret passages? The choice is yours, and each decision will test your ingenuity and resourcefulness.

. Navigate the edge of danger: With every bounce, you'll face the constant threat of falling into the abyss. The margin for error is razor-thin, requiring precise timing and calculated movements. Can you master the art of bouncing and maintain your balance against all odds?

. Push your limits: Prepare to have your skill and patience pushed to the limit. Each level presents increasingly complex puzzles and hazards that will challenge even the most seasoned adventurers. Only the most tenacious and determined players will emerge victorious.

. Unravel the enigma: What lies at the top of these mystifying environments? Uncover hidden clues and unravel the secret that awaits you. As you ascend, the pieces of the puzzle will fall into place, offering a tantalizing glimpse into the extraordinary truth that awaits.

Prepare for an addictive bouncing experience that combines skill, strategy, and a hint of mystery. Can you conquer Ball Pain and claim your place at the summit, or will you forever tumble into the depths below? It's time to bounce your way to greatness!

name: Ball Pain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
